findings.title: Contract Owner can stop transactions for all sales or buys
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop transactions for all sales excluding the owner.

findings.title: Contract Owner can claim all balance of the contract
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to claim all the balance of the contract.

findings.title: Contract Owner can stop contracts from transactions
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop contracts from transactions.

findings.title: Public functions can be declared external to save gas
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: State variables can be declared constant to save gas
findings.description: Constant state variables should be declared constant to save gas.

findings.title: Unused state variables can be removed
findings.description: There are segments that contain unused state variables.

findings.title: Non-conformity to Solidity naming conventions
findings.description: Solidity defines a naming convention that should be followed.

findings.title: Unused functions can be removed
findings.description: Functions that are not used in the contract, and make the code's size bigger.

findings.title: Redundant boolean comparison
findings.description: The comparison to boolean constants is redundant.

findings.title: Variables used before declaration
findings.description: The contract is using a variable before the declaration.

findings.title: Missing events for critical arithmetic parameters
findings.description: Detected missing events for critical arithmetic parameters.

findings.title: Local scope variable shadowing
findings.description: The are variables that are defined in the local scope containing the same name from an upper scope.

findings.title: Uninitialized variables in local scope
findings.description: The are variables that are defined in the local scope and are not initialized.

findings.title: Tautology or contradiction in expressions
findings.description: Detects expressions that are tautologies or contradictions.

findings.title: Division before multiplication operation
findings.description: Performing divisions before multiplications may cause lose of prediction.
